title: Primary 1 - Thematic Curriculum Syllabus (Uganda)
delivery_medium: Local Language / Familiar Language (with English as a subject)
overall_learning_outcomes: Develop basic literacy, mathematics and life skills in a first language or familiar language
Build sufficient English language skills as a basis for P4-P7 English medium instruction
Appreciate culture and understand roles in society
Develop problem-solving abilities and critical thinking in everyday contexts

themes.title: Our School
themes.description: Exploring the school environment, roles, and activities

themes.title: Our Home
themes.description: Understanding family structures and home activities

themes.title: Our Community
themes.description: Exploring community roles, helpers, and services

themes.title: The Human Body and Health
themes.description: Learning body parts, hygiene, and basic health concepts

themes.title: Weather
themes.description: Understanding weather elements and their effects

themes.title: Accidents and Safety
themes.description: Learning about hazards and safe practices

themes.title: Living Together
themes.description: Building social skills and understanding relationships

themes.title: Food And Nutrition
themes.description: Understanding food types, nutrition, and food safety

themes.title: Our Transport
themes.description: Learning about different modes of transport

themes.title: Our Environment
themes.description: Caring for and understanding the natural environment

themes.title: Peace And Security
themes.description: Building peaceful communities and understanding security

teaching_approach: Use of local language as medium of instruction
Integration of practical skills with academic learning
notes: This P1 curriculum follows Uganda's National Curriculum Development Centre (NCDC) thematic approach. Competences emphasize transfer of learning and understanding, not just memorization. All teaching and assessment (except English language assessment in non-English medium schools) should be in the child's local language or a familiar language.
